title: NCLL 10-12 All-Star Team are 2018 District 15 Champions!!
description: NCLL Boys 10-12 All-Star Team are 2018 District 15 Champions!

title: 7/8 Chatham Softball Win
description: NCLL Girls 7/8 All-Stars win annual tournament in Chatham, NY!

title: Softball Champs
description: Congratulations to the 2018 NYS Class B Champion Ichabod Crane Varsity Softball Team!!!  - http://spectrumlocalnews.com/nys/capital-region/sports/2018/06/09/ichabod-crane-softball-captures-state-title

title: Bat Changes
description: All bats used in Little League baseball games and practices must meet USA Bat Standards (metal bats that do not meet this standard will not be allowed for use this season): https://www.littleleague.org/playing-rules/bat-information/
